message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance to you, I understand its worth is $1,200,000. My goal is to ensure we reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $1,000,000. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring fair compensation for my efforts and investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I am looking forward to potentially working with you.
